=API for javadoc.browse=
by Start a web browser from Clojure

Usage: 
{{{
(ns <your-namespace>
  (:use clojure.contrib.javadoc.browse))
}}}
==Overview==
<pre> Christophe Grand</pre>


==Public Variables and Functions==
Shortcuts:
[#open-url-in-browser open-url-in-browser] [#open-url-in-swing open-url-in-swing] 

----
===open-url-in-browser===
====function====
<pre>
Usage: *(_open-url-in-browser_ url)*
</pre>
<pre> Opens url (a string) in the default system web browser.  May not 
work on all platforms.  Returns url on success, nil if not 
supported.</pre>

</pre>
<pre> Opens url (a string) in a Swing window.</pre>
